documentation.text: @dev Revert any transactions that attempt to send ETH to the contract directly
@dev Withdraw EGL's once they have matured

@dev Send EGL reward to miner of the block. Reward caclulated based on how close the block gas limit
is to the desired EGL. The closer it is, the higher the reward
@dev Allows for the withdrawal of liquidity pool tokens once they have matured
@dev Tally Votes for the most recent epoch and calculate the new desired EGL amount
@dev Do not allow owner to renounce ownership, only transferOwnership

@dev Internal function that calculates the rewards due and removes the vote
     * @param _voter Address the voter for be withdrawn for
@dev Issues creator reward EGLs' based on the release schedule
@dev Calculates the current EGL released
@dev Calculates the pool tokens due at time of calling
@dev Calculates bonus EGLs due
@dev Calculates voter reward at time of withdrawal
@dev Revert any transactions that attempt to send ETH to the contract directly
@dev Withdraw EGL's once they have matured

@dev Send EGL reward to miner of the block. Reward caclulated based on how close the block gas limit
is to the desired EGL. The closer it is, the higher the reward
@dev Allows for the withdrawal of liquidity pool tokens once they have matured
@dev Tally Votes for the most recent epoch and calculate the new desired EGL amount
@dev Do not allow owner to renounce ownership, only transferOwnership

@dev Internal function that calculates the rewards due and removes the vote
     * @param _voter Address the voter for be withdrawn for
@dev Issues creator reward EGLs' based on the release schedule
@dev Calculates the current EGL released
@dev Calculates the pool tokens due at time of calling
@dev Calculates bonus EGLs due
@dev Calculates voter reward at time of withdrawal

addSeedAccount(address,uint256).details: Owner only function to add a seeder account with specified number of EGL's

claimSeederEgls(uint256,uint8).details: Function for seed accounts to claim their EGL's and enter initial vote with locked tokens

params._gasTarget: desired gas target for initial vote when claiming tokens
params._lockupDuration: duration to lock tokens for initial vote

claimSupporterEgls(uint256,uint8).details: Allows EGL Genesis contributors to claim their "bonus" EGL's that get entered into initial vote

params._gasTarget: desired gas target for initial vote when claiming tokens
params._lockupDuration: duration to lock tokens for initial vote

params._creatorRewardsAccount: Address that creator rewards get sent to
params._currentEpochStartDate: Start date for the first epoch
params._epochLength: The length of each epoch in seconds
params._genesis: Address of the EGL Genesis contract
params._poolToken: Address of the Balance Pool Token (BPT)
params._seedAccounts: List of accounts to seed with EGL's
params._seedAmounts: Amount of EGLS's to seeds accounts with
params._votingPauseSeconds: Number of seconds to pause voting before votes are tallied

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

reVote(uint256,uint256,uint8).details: Re-Vote to change parameters of an existing vote

params._eglAmount: Amount of EGL's to vote with

renounceOwnership().details: Do not allow owner to renounce ownership, only transferOwnership

sweepPoolRewards().details: Send EGL reward to miner of the block. Reward caclulated based on how close the block gas limit is to the desired EGL. The closer it is, the higher the reward

tallyVotes().details: Tally Votes for the most recent epoch and calculate the new desired EGL amount

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

vote(uint256,uint256,uint8).details: Vote for desired gas limit and upgrade

params._eglAmount: Amount of EGL's to vote with

withdraw().details: Withdraw EGL's once they have matured

withdrawPoolTokens().details: Allows for the withdrawal of liquidity pool tokens once they have matured
